description: A React page component handling OAuth callback for Confluence integration. It manages user authorization status, displays messages, and redirects accordingly.

methods.name: ConfluenceOAuthCallbackPage
methods.description: Main exported React component wrapping OAuth callback logic within a Suspense boundary.

methods.name: ConfluenceOAuthCallbackInner
methods.description: Inner component managing OAuth callback logic, displaying status messages, and redirecting users.
